inputs.tutorial: Specifies the VKPR Formula form, must have the form 'vkpr + object + verb + name'
inputs.label: Enter the New Formula Command:
inputs.name: vkpr_formula

inputs.tutorial: Specifies the path from your workspace with the VKPR formulas
inputs.label: Enter workspace path (Leave empty for current Working dir):
inputs.name: vkpr_workspace_path

inputs.tutorial: Specifies the formula path. If formula is 'vkpr object verb' then its path is '/vkpr/object/verb'
inputs.label: Enter formula path (Leave empty for best guess):
inputs.name: vkpr_formula_path
